description: Number of digits in n-th Mersenne prime.
references: A. H. Beiler, Recreations in the Theory of Numbers, Dover, NY, 1964, p. 19.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
links: R. Mestrovic, Euclid's theorem on the infinitude of primes: a historical survey of its proofs (300 BC--2012) and another new proof, arXiv preprint arXiv:1202.3670, 2012.
crossrefs: See A000043, which is the main entry for this sequence. Cf. A000668.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: One more term from _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 17 2003
